Data: Harris to McCullum, no run good channel from Harris and we see some nice swing away from McCullum as he pushes at the line but misses
Harris to McCullum, 1 run good shape again but a fraction shorter and McCullum guides it down to third man to get underway
Harris to Ingram, 1 run back of a length and Ingram is back and pushing into the off side for a quick single. Harris moves sharply to his left but can't prevent the single
Harris to McCullum, 1 run full and it swings away and McCullum drives off the outside half of the bat to Voges at point wo dives and misfields to allow the single
Harris to Ingram, FOUR runs back of a length and straight and Ingram stands tall and pulls in front of square leg for four
Harris to Ingram, OUT cracking delivery from Harris, he hits a good length and Ingram plays without intent and edges through to Haddin who takes the simplest of catches. Great start for Australia
Bollinger to McCullum, no run good length and angled across McCullum who leaves it alone
Bollinger to McCullum, FOUR runs good length, a fraction too much width, McCullum is back and driving off the back foot over where third slip would be and races away for four, beating third man
Bollinger to McCullum, no run McCullum advances and Bollinger angles the ball straight across him and he leaves it alone
Bollinger to McCullum, 2 runs slightly fuller and McCullum moves forward and punches through straight mid wicket for a couple, good timing
Bollinger to McCullum, no run back of a length and McCullum moves back and defends powerfully back past the bowler
Bollinger to McCullum, no run good length again and angled across McCullum who is content on leaving. No movement for Bollinger but he's still smiling
Harris to Guptill, no run great start to Guptill, Harris hits a perfect length and gets Guptill to play as he defends back to the bowler
Harris to Guptill, 1 run angled into the pads and Guptill is underway playing to fine leg
Harris to McCullum, no run back of a length and McCullum trie to flick it off his hip but misses and it takes him on the thigh
Harris to McCullum, 1 run good length forces McCullum back and he pushes into the covers nicely for a single
Harris to Guptill, no run Harris continues to hit a good length and Guptill is in behind it solidly and defending into the off side
Harris to Guptill, (no ball) Harris oversteps this time, hits a good channel and Guptill is back and defending
Harris to Guptill, FOUR runs Guptill moves back in the crease and Harris tries to hit the hole but offers width and Guptill crunches him through the covers for four
Bollinger to McCullum, no run back of a length and McCullum is back and defending neatly into the off side
Bollinger to McCullum, no run good length on off stump and McCullum plays back down the pitch

Bollinger to McCullum, FOUR runs decent length but McCullum is onto it in a flash and pulls over square leg for four. McCullum is just so quick on his feet and his hands are even quicker through the ball
Bollinger to McCullum, 1 run slightly fuller and McCullum tries to overhit it through the covers but mistimes it and can only get one
Bollinger to Guptill, no run fullish length and Guptill is half forward and defending awkwardly into the covers
Bollinger to Guptill, no run good delivery outside off and Guptill pushes into the off side and calls wait, before Hussey charges to his right at point and dives to collect the ball in one hand
Harris to McCullum, no run McCullum advances and crashes it to point where Hussey parries it to Voges and there is no run
Harris to McCullum, 2 runs back of a length angled into middle stump and McCullum woorks it into mid wicket and they take a couple. Well run by this electric pair
Harris to McCullum, (no ball) 1 run Harris oversteps again and McCullum square drives through the hand of Voges at point to third man. Another free-hit coming up
Harris to Guptill, 1 run length ball and Guptill heaves it into the leg side but without any timing and straight to deep square leg
Harris to McCullum, FOUR runs uses his feet and drives on the up past mid off for four
Harris to McCullum, no run good reply as Harris hits the hole perfectly and McCullum digs it out
Harris to McCullum, no run back of a length and outside off, McCullum pushes to Hussey at cover point
Bollinger to Guptill, FOUR runs helf volley on middle and Guptill plays the perfect on drive, just to the right of the stumps and it races away for four. Gorgeous stroke
Bollinger to Guptill, no run better length this time and Guptill drives but misses, beaten by the angle across him it seems
Bollinger to Guptill, no run full again and Guptill drives nicely to mid off
Bollinger to Guptill, no run this one decks away slightly from Guptill and he plays and misses outside off, well bowled
Bollinger to Guptill, no run good length just on or outside off and he punches to Hussey at point off the back foot
Bollinger to Guptill, FOUR runs half volley outside off and Guptill hits beautifully through the line for four past the man at short cover
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run half volley on off stump to get underway and McCullum drives straight to mid off for a single
Johnson to Guptill, 1 run full outside off and it takes the outside half of the bat and runs to third man
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run slightly slower this time and it's back of a length and McCullum works it off his hip
Johnson to Guptill, no run good channel and Guptill defends into the off side
Johnson to Guptill, no run good length again attacking the stumps and Guptill pushes strongly to point
Johnson to Guptill, no run Johnson continues to hit a nice channel and he hurries Guptill up as he defends to point off the outside edge
Bollinger to McCullum, no run Bollinger is around the wicket and has McCullum defending back down the pitch

Bollinger to McCullum, OUT good length, McCullum moves back and looks to push into the off side, it takes the inside edge back onto his pads and then onto the stumps and Bollinger is rapt with that. Well bowled, the change of angle did the trick
Bollinger to Taylor, no run good length but a fraction too straight and Taylor plays to square leg
Bollinger to Taylor, no run Bollinger hustles in and attacks the body and Taylor defends off the back foot to square leg
Bollinger to Taylor, no run good channel from Bollinger and Taylor allows it through to Haddin
Bollinger to Taylor, no run fuller on off stump and Taylor drives powerfully into the ground and White gets a hand to it at short cover
Johnson to Guptill, no run full and just outside off stump and he drives nicely but straight to Hussey at point
Johnson to Guptill, 1 run back of a length and Guptill goes back and plays late, guiding it to third man
Johnson to Taylor, no run good length from Johnson draws Taylor forward and he defends strongly into the off side
Johnson to Taylor, no run pace and bounce from Johnson and Taylor is back and jumping into a defensive shot and the ball falls into the point region safely
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs decent length but wide and Taylor stands tall and square drives through point for four, super stroke to get underway
Johnson to Taylor, no run slower ball along the same line and Taylor spots the chane of pace and allows it through to the keeper
Bollinger to Guptill, no run cracking length from Bollinger forces Guptill back and it takes an inside edge, straight into the ground and it bounces over the stumps
Bollinger to Guptill, FOUR runs decent length angled across Guptill and he drives beautifully through extra cover for four, great timing
Bollinger to Guptill, no run around the wicket now and he's full again and Guptill drives to mid off
Bollinger to Guptill, 1 run great delivery from Bollinger forces Guptill back and he fends it away from his body, it takes the outside of the bat and runs to third man
Bollinger to Taylor, no run back over the wicket and Taylor drives a full delivery to mid off
Bollinger to Taylor, no run good channel and Taylor allows it through to the keeper
Johnson to Guptill, no run fuller on leg stump and Guptill pushes to mid on
Johnson to Guptill, no run full and a hint of shape back into Guptill, it takes him on the pad and the bowler goes up in appeal but it's going down leg
Johnson to Guptill, no run back of a length and pushed to point off the outside half of the bat

Johnson to Guptill, OUT fuller, a fraction slower and Guptill drives from low on the bat in the air to White at short cover who takes a very easy catch, well bowled Johnson and the Australians are delighted
Johnson to Broom, no run Johnson shapes it back into Broom just slightly and he gets an inside edge onto his pads
Johnson to Broom, no run back of a length and Broom pushes into the off side
Harris to Taylor, no run superb delivery from Harris beats Taylor outside off. Taylor looks at the pitch as though that moved a fraction
Harris to Taylor, no run back of a length and Taylor plays early trying to work it through square leg and it falls into the leg side off the edge
Harris to Taylor, no run full and pushed into the off side
Harris to Taylor, no run Harris continues to demand a lot of the batsmen, hitting a great length and Taylor defends to extra cover
Harris to Taylor, no run back of a length at middle stump and Taylor plays to mid wicket
Harris to Taylor, FOUR runs finally Harris misses his channel and it's short and wide and Taylor cuts just over the top of point for four
Johnson to Broom, no run back of a length and Broom defends square of the wicket on the off side
Johnson to Broom, 1 wide bumper from Johnson but well down the leg side
Johnson to Broom, no run good length and slightly slower from Johnson and Broom plays to point where Hussey dives to field nicely
Johnson to Broom, 1 run back into the pads and Broom clips it off his hip to fine leg
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run fullish outside off and Taylor drives strongly to the off side sweeper
Johnson to Broom, 2 runs good length and Broom comes forward and uses the pace, guiding it through backward point and Bollinger dives on the boundary to save the boundary and they take two
Johnson to Broom, 1 run too straight and Broom is easily able to whip it backward of square on the leg side to the sweeper
Harris to Broom, no run cracking yorker from Harris and Broom digs it out
Harris to Broom, FOUR runs good channel and Broom drives off the outside edge through where first slip would've been and Haddin isn't able to move to get anywhere near it and it runs away for four
Harris to Broom, FOUR runs four more to Broom and Harris strays in line and Broom clips it fine past fine leg for four
Harris to Broom, no run angled into leg stump and Broom works it to mid wicket
Harris to Broom, no run good yorker again from Harris and Broom plays it into the leg side
Harris to Broom, no run good length attacking off stump and Broom defends back to Harris who shapes to throw the keepers' stumps down but holds back
Hauritz to Taylor, FOUR runs Hauritz gives it air to start with and Taylor goes down on one knee early, it dips on him but he sweeps it fine of deep square leg for four
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run swept from well outside off to deep mid wicket with no timing
Hauritz to Broom, no run tossed up and Broom defends off the inside edge
Hauritz to Broom, no run flighted again and Broom plays it later this time and times it nicely to cover
Hauritz to Broom, 1 run flatter and in at the pads and Broom works into the leg side for an easy single
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run tossed up again but straighter this time and Taylor whips it through square leg to the sweeper
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run full and square driven off the outside half to third man
Hopes to Broom, no run good length and Broom mistimes the drive into the off side
Hopes to Broom, no run full and Broom drives strongly to short cover. Hopes really hustling through his overs here
Hopes to Broom, no run half volley on off stump and Broom crunches it but straight to mid off
Hopes to Broom, 1 run good length but too straight and Broom works it off his hip
Hopes to Taylor, no run full outside off and Taylor drives to White at extra cover who dives to field the ball cleanly
Hauritz to Broom, 1 bye nicely flighted from Hauritz and Broom is beaten on the inside edge and Haddin can't hold on and they take a bye. That has turned a mile from outside off
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run well flighted and Taylor drives through mid off
Hauritz to Broom, no run slightly flatter and Broom cuts to backward point
Hauritz to Broom, no run tossed up and Broom uses his feet and plays back to the bowler
Hauritz to Broom, 1 run full outside off and Broom waits for it and drives through mid on for a single
Hauritz to Taylor, 2 runs nicely flighted and Taylor plays nicely into the leg side and the pair run a quick couple to square leg
Hopes to Broom, no run comes down the track and cuts to point
Hopes to Broom, 1 run good length and Broom is half forward and playing to third man
Hopes to Taylor, 1 wide back of a length and wide down the leg side
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run angled into the pads and Taylor collects to fine leg off his hip
Hopes to Broom, 1 run good delivery but Broom drives nicely back past Hopes for a single to mid off
Hopes to Taylor, no run good delivery and Taylor pushes into the off side
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run god length again and Taylor plays with softer hands and gaps it nicely to get a quick single
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run tossed up outside off and Taylor uses the pace to play through backward point to the sweeper
Hauritz to Broom, no run well flighted and Broom tries to sweep but misses
Hauritz to Broom, 1 run nicely flighted again and Broom moves across to the line outside off and works it through mid on
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run straighter to Taylor and he plays through square leg
Hauritz to Broom, 1 wide arm ball from Hauritz and there's some encouraging drift but it's outside the wide line, Broom looks to cut but misses
Hauritz to Broom, 1 run tossed up and Broom defends into the off side for a well run single
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run tossed up nicely again and Taylor pushes with soft hands into the off side for another single
Hopes to Taylor, 2 runs yorker and Taylor places it nicely into the covers, it beats White and they get two to the sweeper
Hopes to Taylor, no run full outside off and driven sweetly to White at cover
Hopes to Taylor, 2 runs angled into the leg stump and Taylor works it through the leg side for a couple to long leg
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run good length and Taylor plays with soft hands into the off side for a quick single
Hopes to Broom, 1 run angled down leg again and Broom whips it fine to fine leg
Hopes to Taylor, SIX runs short outside off and Taylor pulls powerfully over square leg for six. Hussey dives full stretch in the deep and can't get a finger on it as it bounces just over the rope
Hauritz to Broom, 1 run full and Broom pushes forward and plays into the off side
Hauritz to Taylor, no run full and slow outside off, Taylor tries to sweep it fine but misses
Hauritz to Taylor, no run Taylor shapes to come down the track but sees it is short and cuts to backward point
Hauritz to Taylor, SIX runs tossed up again wide of off stump and Taylor goes down on one knee and slog sweeps over long on for six
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run full again and Taylor is forced to wait for this one and he square drives forward of point in the gap
Hauritz to Broom, no run flatter and Broom goes to cut but misses
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run full and wide of off and square driven to third man
Hopes to Broom, 1 run back of a length and Broom uses the pace and guides to third man
Hopes to Taylor, 2 runs half volley and Taylor drives nicely through the off side to Harris the sweeper who slides to save the boundary and they take a couple
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run full and pushed to mid off for a quick single
Hopes to Broom, 1 run good length and Broom comes forward and pushes into the off side into the gap at point for one
Hopes to Taylor, no run Hopes attacks the stumps with a slightly slower delivery and Taylor gets a leading edge along the ground into the off side
Johnson to Broom, no run Johnson back into the attack much to the angst of the crowd. He hits a good channel and Broom defends into the off side
Johnson to Broom, 1 run too straight and Broom gets inside the line and works it into the off side
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run shorter this time and Taylor plays with soft hands into the off side
Johnson to Broom, no run full and driven to cover
Johnson to Broom, no run half volley and a hint of away swing and Broom drives off the outside half of the bat to point

Johnson to Broom, OUT cracking ball from Johnson as he spears it into leg stump, it swings away just enough and Broom is squared up trying to play to mid on/mid wicket and it takes the edge through to Watson at first slip. Australia and Johnson break what was a promising partnership
Hopes to Taylor, FOUR runs full and just enough width for Taylor to square drive past point for four. Great half century from Taylor
Hopes to Taylor, no run full and driven nicely to mid off
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run good length but Taylor plays with soft hands into the off side for a short single
Hopes to Styris, no run back of a length and Styris is back and across and driving back to the bowler
Hopes to Styris, no run good length and he hurries Styris up and he pushes back to the bowler
Hopes to Styris, no run bumper from Hopes, Styris shapes to pull but then decides against it as it's a little quicker than he originally thought
Johnson to Taylor, no run full and wide half volley which beats Taylor on the outside of the bat, hint of away swing to the right hander
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run back of a length and Taylor moves back and looks to push into the off side, it takes the inside edge and rolls into the leg side and they have time for a single
Johnson to Styris, no run full and some more away swing from the right handed Styris and he is beaten on the drive
Johnson to Styris, 1 run back of a length and Styris works it to mid wicket
Johnson to Taylor, no run back of a length again and cut to point
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run full and wide and square driven to deep point, well timed but straight to the man on the fence
Watson to Taylor, no run short and cut straight to point
Watson to Taylor, 2 runs shortish and cut again but off the top edge fine down to third man and Hauitz does really well down there to keep the scoring to two
Watson to Taylor, no run full on off stump and Taylor pushes into the off side
Watson to Taylor, no run good length on off again and he defends back to the bowler
Watson to Taylor, 1 run good length and Taylor moves forward and pushes into the off side through the gap at point
Watson to Styris, no run back of a length and Styris drives on the up back to the bowler
Hauritz to Taylor, no run good length and Taylor plays back to the bowler
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run good length again and Taylor plays later this time and into the off side for a quick single
Hauritz to Styris, no run tossed up outside off and Styris leaves
Hauritz to Styris, no run flatter this time and he guides to short third man
Hauritz to Styris, no run well flighted and this one really turns, hitting Johnson's footmarks and it takes Styrius on the pads as he looks to play into the off side
Hauritz to Styris, no run Styris plays a pre-meditated sweep and misses outside off stump, well bowled by Hauritz
Watson to Taylor, no run slower ball and Taylor defends into the off side
Watson to Taylor, no run good length and driven off the outside half of the bat to point who moves well to save one
Watson to Taylor, 1 run fuller outside off and pushed to cover for one
Watson to Styris, no run good length and Styris moves back and drives back to the bowler
Watson to Styris, no run slower ball, leg cutter, angled into leg stump and Styris plays to mid wicket
Watson to Styris, 1 run back of a length at middle stump, Styris is back and pushing to long on from the back foot, good cricket
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run nicely flighted outside off and full and Styris drives to long on
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run good length and Taylor plays with soft hands to backward point and they take a quick single as the ball hits Taylor in thr back from the throw at the stumps
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run full and straight and worked into the leg side
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run full and straight again and Taylor whips it through the leg side
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run wide of off stump again and Styris works it from well outside off through backward square on the leg side
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run too straight and whipped into the leg side again
Watson to Taylor, no run back of a length and defended into the off side

Watson to Taylor, OUT bumper from Watson and Taylor takes the bait, pulling off the top edge out to Hussey on the square leg fence, he moves forward and takes the catch low down. Watson has a real knack of taking wickets at crucial times and there's another. Advantage Australia. Taylor absolutely furious
Watson to Styris, no run back of a length and Styris defends into the off side
Watson to Styris, no run good length again and Styris pushes into the off side
Watson to Styris, 1 run back of a length and too straight and Styris whips it through the leg side
Watson to Hopkins, no run good length has Hopkins fending into the point region
Hopes to Styris, no run outside off stump and he plays into the off side
Hopes to Styris, no run good length and Styris plays aerially towards mid on
Hopes to Styris, 2 runs good length and Styris works it past Ponting at mid wicket and they complete two
Hopes to Styris, FOUR runs super shot from Styris as Hopes offers just a fraction of width and Styris square drives backward of point for four, great timing
Hopes to Styris, no run attacks the stumps and played into the leg side
Hopes to Styris, no run good length and defended back along the pitch to the bowler
Watson to Hopkins, no run good channel to Hopkins and he's in behind it defending back to the bowler
Watson to Hopkins, no run back of a length and Hopkins pushes into the off side but can't find a gap
Watson to Hopkins, 1 wide short from Watson and Hopkins moves inside the line and it's called wide down leg
Watson to Hopkins, no run Watson continues to ask questions, attacking the stumps and Hopkins pushes back along the pitch
Watson to Hopkins, no run slower ball brings Hopkins forward and he plays to point, calls yes, but Styris says no straight away
Watson to Hopkins, 1 run good length hurries Hopkins up and he pushes towards mid on for a single
Watson to Styris, 1 run fuller on middle stump and Styris drives comfortably to long on
Hopes to Styris, 2 runs full outside off and Styris drives nicely through the off side to Hussey on the boundary and they have plenty of time to collect a couple
Hopes to Styris, 1 run good length on off stump and he uses the pace and guides to third man
Hopes to Hopkins, no run Hopkins comes forward and plays into the off side
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run fuller this time and Hopkins drives through the gap at point to the sweeper on the off side
Hopes to Styris, 1 run short and Styris pulls it fine for a single
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run back of a length outside off and Hopkins plays neatly into the gap at point
Harris to Hopkins, 1 run wide of off stump and Hopkins guides it fine to third man

Harris to Styris, 4 runs good length and Styris moves back and punches through straight mid wicket off the back foot, Bollinger chases it down and flicks it back inside the rope but nobody is following him to collect. He hits the picket fence and stays down. Menawhile the batsmen run four. Bollinger stays
Harris to Styris, 1 run angled into the pads and Styris clips it through square leg
Harris to Hopkins, no run yorker played nicely to mid wicket
Harris to Hopkins, no run good channel and Hopkins plays and misses just outside off
Harris to Hopkins, 2 runs angled into the pads and Hopkins chips it through mid wicket for a couple to Hussey who moves around nicely from square leg on the fence to collect
Hopes to Styris, 1 run fullish and Styris square drives through point to the sweeper
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run good channel and Hopkins pushes into the off side with his bottom hand
Hopes to Styris, no run outside off stump and Styris tries to play to long on but mistimes it to mid wicket
Hopes to Styris, 1 run angled into leg stump and Styris clips it fine to fine leg
Hopes to Hopkins, no run great channel again and Hopkins is beaten outside off stump
Hopes to Hopkins, FOUR runs a fraction fuller and Hopkins hammers it between the two men inside the circle at point for four. Great gapping from the wee man
Bollinger to Styris, 1 run good length angled across Styris and he uses the pace to play to third man
Bollinger to Hopkins, 1 run around the wicket to Hopkins and he gets an inside edge to the sweeper at square leg
Bollinger to Styris, 1 run good length and Styris plays as late as possible with soft hands and drops the ball just beside the stumps allowing for a very comfortable single, well played
Bollinger to Hopkins, 1 leg bye Hopkins moves across to off stump and tries to defend into the leg side, it takes him low on the torso and it runs towards third man
Bollinger to Styris, 1 run angled into Styris' hip and he clips it to deep square leg
Bollinger to Hopkins, no run bumper from Bollinger and Hopkins goes underneath and tries to ramp it but misses
Hauritz to Styris, no run tossed up and worked to Ponting at mid wicket
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run short outside off and Styris cuts to deep point
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run short again outside off and Hopkins drives through point to the sweeper
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run fuller and straighter and Styris works it through square leg for a single
Hauritz to Hopkins, no run well flighted outside off and Hopkins comes forward and tries to play into the off side but misses and Haddin takes the bails off but he never left the crease
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run tossed up outside off and Hopkins moves across his stumps and plays through square leg
Bollinger to Hopkins, no run good channel played to point
Bollinger to Hopkins, no run Hopkins comes forward and plays off the inside edge to White at mid wicket
Bollinger to Hopkins, no run fuller on off stump and Hopkins tries to whip it straight through the leg side but hits it to White again at mid wicket
Bollinger to Hopkins, no run good bouncer from Bollinger forces Hopkins to go underneath as he looks to ramp but pulls out
Bollinger to Hopkins, 1 run back of a length and Hopkins comes forward and uses the pace, playing to Voges at point but he misfields to allow a single
Bollinger to Styris, no run good length and Styris tries to drive, gets an inside edge back onto his pad and then in the air towards the bowler but it falls well short and there's no run
Hauritz to Hopkins, no run nicely flighted outside off and Hopkins tries to sweep but can't get enough on it
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run Hopkins walks across his stumps and whips it through the leg side
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run Styris moves across to the off side and works it behind square on the leg side with soft hands
Hauritz to Hopkins, no run played straight to mid wicket from outside off
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run short and wide and cut to deep point
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run tossed up on off stump and Styris drives nicely to long on. New Zealand content on taking the singles as they work towards the batting power play... when will they take it?
Bollinger to Styris, 1 run short delivery cramps Styris for room on the pull and it goes in the air towards mid wicket but wide of White and they get a single
Bollinger to Hopkins, no run full and clipped to mid wicket from just outside off stump

Bollinger to Hopkins, SIX runs Bollinger goes short and Hopkins upper cuts over third man for six. Daryl Tuffey, who is not playing due to a calf strain, stands up off his seat and takes a comfortable catch in the stands
Bollinger to Hopkins, 1 run angled into the hip and he collects into the leg side
Bollinger to Styris, 1 run full on off stump and Styris waits for it and drives through point to the sweeper
Bollinger to Hopkins, 1 run short and cut to point, Voges dives to save it but can't hold onto it and they get a single
Johnson to Hopkins, 1 run full and pushed into the off side for a single
Johnson to Styris, no run short and Styris sways inside the line
Johnson to Styris, 1 run fullish length and Styris pushes to Hauritz at mid on and he steals a sharp single, well run
Johnson to Hopkins, 1 run full and Hopkins drives off the inside edge onto his foot and into the off side for a quick single
Johnson to Styris, 1 run back of a length and Styris moves back and defends with soft hands into the off side for another short single
Johnson to Hopkins, 1 run around the wicket and full, Hopkins square drives to the point sweeper, well timed but he couldn't find a bigger gap in the deep
Watson to Hopkins, no run half volley driven to cover
Watson to Hopkins, 1 run short and cut over point to the sweeper on the bounce, well timed but he couldn't pick the gap in the deep
Watson to Styris, SIX runs back of a length but just a fraction too straight and Styris whips him over backward square for a maximum. Great timing
Watson to Styris, no run better length and played into the off side

Watson to Styris, OUT fuller from Watson, Styris tires to hit him straight down the ground over the top, he plays too early and gets it high in the air and Harris moves forward from long off to take the catch at mid off
Watson to Hopkins, no run fuller again and driven to mid off
Johnson to Vettori, no run short ball from Johnson, Vettori tries to ramp it but misses

Johnson to Vettori, OUT Vettori moves back and pushes into the off side and sets off for a run, taking on Ponting at cover, Ponting picks it up and hits the stumps to find Vettori just short of his ground, superb fielding from the skipper!
Johnson to Hopkins, no run full outside off and driven to cover
Johnson to Hopkins, 1 wide full and too wide of off stump
Johnson to Hopkins, no run back of a length and worked off his hip to short fine leg
Johnson to Hopkins, no run 150 kph, good length outside off, Hopkins tries to drive through the off side but misses
Johnson to Hopkins, no run good length on middle and played into the on side
Watson to Bond, no run good bouncer and Bond ducks underneath
Watson to Bond, no run back of a length at the body and Bond plays back along the pitch
Watson to Bond, 1 run full on off stump and driven firmly to mid off
Watson to Hopkins, FOUR runs good length and Hopkins punches on the up over cover for four. That's a difficult stroke to play but he made it look quite easy
Watson to Hopkins, FOUR runs Hopkins goes inside the line and helps it on it's way over short fine leg for four
Watson to Hopkins, 1 run yorker speared into off stump and Hopkins digs it out to mid on for a single
Johnson to Hopkins, SIX runs Hopkins goes deep in the crease and pulls off the top edge over fine leg for six. Crucial runs for New Zealand and Hopkins playing a very handy role at the death here
Johnson to Hopkins, 1 run fuller and driven to long on
Johnson to Bond, SIX runs good length on middle stump and Bond tries to swing it over the leg side, it takes a leading edge over square third man for six!
Johnson to Bond, 1 wide bumper down the leg side and the crowd roars
Johnson to Bond, no run in the slot outside off and Bond swings and misses
Johnson to Bond, no run half volley crunched to mid off
Johnson to Bond, 2 runs Dropped Bond swings it high in the air over mid off, Hopes moves back and puts it down and they take two. It just seems as though he took his eye off it at the crucial moment

Harris to Hopkins, OUT low full toss and Hopkins drives in the air to Watson at mid off. He got underneath it but got it high on the blade with no timing whatsoever. Important breakthrough for Australia with only Southee and Mason to come
Harris to Bond, 1 run low full toss driven to point
Harris to Southee, 1 run edged to Haddin and he dives to his right one handed and yorks himself and can't hold onto it
Harris to Bond, 1 run good length driven to point again for another single

Harris to Southee, OUT Southee walks slightly across his stumps and tries to work it through the leg side and it sneaks past his pads and takes leg stump and New Zealand sink further into trouble! Harris with another breakthrough
Harris to Mason, 2 runs full on leg stick and clipped to long leg for a couple
Johnson to Bond, no run outswinging yorker and Bond plays and misses just outside off
Johnson to Bond, OUT full and straight and Bond drives and edges through to Haddin and Australia wrap up the innings quickly.

Welcome back to Seddon Park in Hamilton where Australia are in pursuit of 246 to win. New Zealand fell well short of the par total and will find it difficult to contain the Australian batsmen without real scoreboard pressure. Australia have a real opportunity to spend time in the middle and push on from the many
Join us in 40 minutes folks as Australia begin their chase for 246 to win and a vital 2-1 lead in the five match series.
Let's take a drink...
Bond to Watson, no run cracking start from Bond as this one hoops back into Watson from well outside off and he leaves it and it takes him high on the pads. New Zealand appeal but Bowden says not out
Bond to Watson, FOUR runs short from Bond and Watson pulls strongly through forward square leg for four
Bond to Watson, no run big inswinger again from Bond and it's fuller, takes Watson on the pad first then bat, they appeal and it's given not out
Bond to Watson, no run back of a length and Watson is in behind it and defending into the off side
Bond to Watson, FOUR runs fraction short and Watson is into position quickly and pulling powerfully over mid on for one bounce four, super shot!
Bond to Watson, no run fullish and wide of off and Watson leaves it alone
Southee to Haddin, no run good length and Haddin is in behind it defending into the off side
Southee to Haddin, 1 wide angles down leg looking for too much swing and it's called wide
Southee to Haddin, no run comes down the pitch and drives on the up to Vettori at mid off on the bounce
Southee to Haddin, no run back of a length and defended into the off side
Southee to Haddin, no run Haddin walks away to leg and launches it in the air towards Vettori at mid off again but it falls short
Southee to Haddin, 2 runs short and wide and cut backward of point for a couple. Ingram does well on the fence to save the boundary
Southee to Haddin, no run good length and Haddin is back and defending into the off side just beside the stumps
Bond to Watson, no run fuller and wider from Bond and Watson allows it through to the keeper
Bond to Watson, no run full and wide again and Watson is down on one knee and driving nicely but straight to Guptill at cover
Bond to Watson, no run half volley on off stump and Watson drives sweetly to mid off where Vettori does well to pick it up
Bond to Watson, no run good length and Watson uses the width to guide to Taylor at first slip
Bond to Watson, 1 run back of a length and wider of off this time and Watson guides it nicely to third man
Bond to Haddin, no run good length delivery outside off and Haddin moves across and defends into the off side, playing well away from his body but he played it late and watched it hard enough
Southee to Watson, no run good length from Southee forces Watson back and into a defence
Southee to Watson, no run Southee attacks the stumps and Watson plays to mid wicket
Southee to Watson, 1 run good channel and Watson uses the width to guide it to third man
Southee to Haddin, 1 run Southee angles into the pads and Haddin clips it to the left of Bond at short fine leg and they take an easy single
Southee to Watson, no run back of a length and Watson plays into the off side
Southee to Watson, no run full on middle stump and Watson drives neatly to mid on
Bond to Haddin, no run full on off stump and Haddin drives in the air to Vettori at mid off on the bounce
Bond to Haddin, no run good length on off stump and defended into the off side
Bond to Haddin, no run back of a length wide outside off and Haddin punches to point off the back foot
Bond to Haddin, no run fuller and we see a hint of inswing and Haddin drives to Vettori at mid off
Bond to Haddin, no run half volley on or outside off stump and Haddin drives to Styris at cover
Bond to Haddin, no run absolute jaffa from Bond and Haddin is committed to play the line, back of a length, it nips away a fraction and it just slides past the outside edge
Southee to Watson, no run good length on off stump and Watson is in behind it and defending into the off side
Southee to Watson, FOUR runs short and wide from Southee, Watson winds up and cracks through backward point for four
Southee to Watson, no run back to a good length and Watson is forced to defend off the back foot
Southee to Watson, no run fraction fuller from Southee and Watson defends off the front foot into the off side
Southee to Watson, 1 run Southee bends his back and it's just short enough for Watson to pull off the bottom edge to McCullum at deep square leg
Southee to Haddin, 1 run back of a length and enough width for Haddin to cut to third man
Bond to Haddin, no run Bind hones in on off stump and Haddin plays into the off side
Bond to Haddin, FOUR runs full and too straight from Bond and Haddin clips it through mid wicket for four, great shot

Bond to Haddin, no run Dropped Bond charges in and goes fuller to Haddin who drives it straight back at him in the air and he can't hold onto it in his follow through. Bond's left hand has blown up remarkably in just a short time and he is receiving some attention from the medical staff
Bond to Haddin, no run much slower this time from Bond as it's back of a length and Haddin drives off the back foot to point
Bond to Haddin, 1 run fuller and driven off the outside half of the bat to McCullum at point and he parries it and they take a quick single
Bond to Watson, no run hits a good channel again and Watson plays into the off side

Southee to Haddin, OUT Southee bends his back and Haddin is forward and it takes the outside edge, Hopkins runs around to pick up while Watson has called him through for the single and Hopkins hits the stumps to find Watson short of his ground. Great work from the wee fella behind the stumps
Southee to Ponting, no run good length outside off and Ponting allows it through to the keeper
Southee to Ponting, 1 run back of a length and Ponting gets an inside edge past his stumps to fine leg to get underway
Southee to Haddin, no run good length and played into the off side
Southee to Haddin, 1 run slower ball and worked into the leg side through mid wicket for a single to the leg side sweeper

Southee to Ponting, no run cracking ball from Southee as he really hits the deck, hits a good length and Ponting comes forward and tries to drive on the up but it beats the outside edge and through to Hopkins
Bond to Haddin, FOUR runs half volley just outside off and Haddin drives straight back past the bowler for four, superb timing
Bond to Haddin, no run good length and Haddin stands on the crease and plays into the off side
Bond to Haddin, no run full slower ball from Bond and Haddin plays too early and mistimes/drags it into the pitch and back to the bowler
Bond to Haddin, 1 run back of a length but too straight allows Haddin to whip it into the leg side for a comfortable single
Bond to Ponting, no run good length on off stump and Ponting plays back down the line and to the bowler
Bond to Ponting, no run full and wide and pushed to McCullum at point
Southee to Haddin, 2 runs back of a length in at the body and Haddin gets an inside edge into the leg side and they're able to complete two
Southee to Haddin, no run good length and Haddin punches the ball into the off side
Southee to Haddin, no run decent length again and Haddin tries to heave it over the leg side and doesn't time it and it rolls to Mason at mid on
Southee to Haddin, 1 run good length and Haddin works it into mid wicket for a single
Southee to Ponting, no run Southee continues to hit the deck and Ponting is back and defending into the covers

Southee to Ponting, FOUR runs Dropped Ponting tries to drive Southee on the up, it takes a thick edge and Taylor dives full stretch to his right at first slip, he gets a couple of fingers to it and races away for four. Good effort from Taylor to get close to that
Mason to Haddin, (no ball) FOUR runs good channel from Mason and with no slip Haddin guides it fine for four, well played. He has overstepped as well! Free-hit coming up
Mason to Haddin, SIX runs Haddin sits back in his crease and launches a full delivery over long on for six! Super stroke
Mason to Haddin, FOUR runs full on middle stump and Haddin flicks it through mid wicket for four
Mason to Haddin, no run full and driven back to the bowler
Mason to Haddin, FOUR runs decent length from Mason and Haddin drives on the up, just to the left of Mason's outstretched hand and it runs away for four
Mason to Haddin, no run better length and Haddin can only play into the off side
Mason to Haddin, 1 run full on middle and Haddin drives beautifully back past the bowler for a single to long off
Southee to Haddin, 1 leg bye too straight from Southee and Haddin gets a pad on it and they take a leg bye into the leg side
Southee to Ponting, FOUR runs back of a length and Ponting waits nicely on it and punches through point for four, that is a classy shot
Southee to Ponting, 1 run draws Ponting forward and he guides to third man off an open face
Southee to Haddin, no run shortish and wide and Haddin cuts off the bottom edge through to Hopkins on the bounce
Southee to Haddin, 1 run short and wide and cut to third man
Southee to Ponting, no run fuller and attacking off stump and Ponting is forward and defending with hard hands into the off side
Mason to Haddin, 1 run slower ball driven to long off
Mason to Ponting, no run good length on off stump and Ponting gets an inside edge onto his pads and feels a little pain
Mason to Ponting, no run back of a length and Ponting plays into the off side
Mason to Ponting, no run good channel again and Ponting drives firmly to mid off
Mason to Ponting, FOUR runs slower ball drifts down leg and Ponting hits it out of the middle and it beats the men behind square on the leg side for four
Mason to Ponting, no run fuller and driven to mid on
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run flat on middle and Haddin plays to mid on and steals a quick single
Vettori to Ponting, no run good delivery from Vettori has Ponting defending from the crease
Vettori to Ponting, no run well flighted and Ponting comes forward and plays back to the bowler
Vettori to Ponting, no run tossed up on off stump and Ponting lunges forward and defends into the off side
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run arm ball from Vettori drifts into leg stick and Ponting clips him into the leg side
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run nicely flighted and drifted towards leg stump and he plays through mid wicket to the sweeper
Mason to Haddin, SIX runs good length from Mason but Haddin has no respect, driving on the up over long on for six! Immense timing
Mason to Haddin, no run fullish and driven sweetly to Styris at short cover
Mason to Haddin, 1 run he attacks middle stump this time and Haddin heaves it through the leg side to the sweeper
Mason to Ponting, 1 run fuller and punched to Styris at mid off who does well to restrict the scoring to one
Mason to Haddin, 1 run good delivery, Haddin comes forward and defends, it takes an inside edge back onto his pad and they're able to get an easy single
Mason to Ponting, no run good length and Ponting pushes into the off side
Vettori to Haddin, no run flat from Vettori and Haddin plays back along the pitch
Vettori to Haddin, no run flat again and attacking middle stump and he defends
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run angled towards leg stump and worked through the leg side to bring up fifty, well played Brad Haddin
Vettori to Ponting, no run darted into middle stump and played into the off side
Vettori to Ponting, no run tossed up and Ponting luncges forward and gets on inside edge back onto his pad and Vettori and Hopkins go up but it's given not out
Vettori to Ponting, no run flighted into middle stump and Ponting defends into the leg side
Styris to Haddin, no run back of a length and defended neatly into the leg side
Styris to Haddin, no run good length, a fraction straight and Haddin plays to square leg
Styris to Haddin, 1 run fuller this time and driven to long on
Styris to Ponting, no run Styris just ripping out some quick off spinners this over and Ponting plays to square leg
Styris to Ponting, no run fuller on middle and Ponting drives back to the bowler
Styris to Ponting, no run a fraction too straight and Ponting whips it to square leg where Taylro fields well to prevent a boundary
Vettori to Haddin, no run angled into middle stump from arounf the wicket and played back to the bowler
Vettori to Haddin, no run similar delivery again from Vettori and played into the leg side
Vettori to Haddin, no run quicker and flatter and Haddin cuts to short third man
Vettori to Haddin, no run a touch slower than the previous delivery and Haddin guides to third man
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run tossed up on off stump and Haddin drives nicely past Vettori to long off
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run angeld into middle stump and Ponting gets an inside edge into the leg side
Styris to Ponting, 1 run just too straight and Ponting clips it off his pads to fine leg
Styris to Haddin, no run better channel and Haddin plays to Guptill at mid wicket
Styris to Haddin, no run good line and length and Haddin drives off the back foot to mid wicket
Styris to Haddin, no run slightly wider of off and Haddin uses the pace to play to short third man but hits it straight at him
Styris to Haddin, no run fuller on middle and Haddin tries to drive through mid on but mistimes it to mid wicket
Styris to Haddin, 1 run Styris loses his line and angles down leg and it's clipped to fine leg for a single
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run back of a length and guided to Bond at short third man
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run shorter and Ponting moves back and cuts to deep point
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run tossed up and Haddin stands up and sweeps into the leg side
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run draws Ponting forward and he pushes into the off side and takes a great quick single, well played and well run
Vettori to Haddin, no run Haddin uses his feet and clips to mid wicket
Vettori to Haddin, 2 runs too straight from Vettori and Haddin whips it into the leg side and they run well for two behind square
Styris to Ponting, no run good length on middle and Ponting plays to square leg
Styris to Ponting, 1 run slightly fuller and Ponting drives to long on
Styris to Haddin, no run half volley outside off and Haddin crunches it to Vettori at mid off
Styris to Haddin, SIX runs full from Styris and Haddin plays a check-drive on the up and it goes all the way for six. That is glorious from Haddin. So easy on the eye...
Styris to Haddin, no run back of a length and Haddin puhes back at Styris who is still in disbelief at the previous stroke
Styris to Haddin, no run good length and played to mid wicket where Guptill fields
Vettori to Ponting, 2 runs flat on middle stump and punched through the off side to the sweeper who has to move a long way in the deep
Vettori to Ponting, no run tossed up, Ponting comes forward and sweeps, it bounces and takes Ponting on the neck
Vettori to Ponting, no run tossed up again and driven back to the bowler
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run full on off and Ponting drives slightly uppishly to long off
Vettori to Haddin, no run flatter angled into middle and Haddin defends back to the bowler
Vettori to Haddin, no run darted into middle stump and played back to the bowler
Mason to Ponting, 2 runs good length and Ponting moves back and punches beautifully through cover off the back foot for a couple
Mason to Ponting, 2 runs too straight and worked into the leg side for a couple to deep square leg
Mason to Ponting, 1 run good length and Ponting drives off the inside edge through square leg to the man on the ropes
Mason to Haddin, no run back of a length and pushed back to the bowler
Mason to Haddin, 1 run yorker length and wide and guided to third man
Mason to Ponting, FOUR runs full on off stump and Ponting stands tall and drives gloriously back past the bowler for four. Ponting is all class
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run full on middle stump and driven to long on
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run slower ball allows Ponting to use the depth of the crease and cut to deep cover point
Vettori to Haddin, no run good channel and defended back to the bowler
Vettori to Haddin, FOUR runs tossed up and Haddin clips it over mid wicket for four on the bounce, such good timing
Vettori to Haddin, no run tossed up and played into the off side
Vettori to Haddin, no run well flighted again and defended into the leg side
Bond to Ponting, 2 runs slower ball first up from Bond and Ponting drives in the air with hard hands and through the covers for a couple, Guptill moves sharply to keep the scoring to two
Bond to Ponting, no run half volley driven to Vettori at mid off and he dives to prevent the single
Bond to Ponting, no run fuller and Ponting is forward and playing to backward point
Bond to Ponting, FOUR runs back of a length and Ponting plays it late and drives through point for four, great stroke
Bond to Ponting, 1 run back of a length and punched through the off side to the sweeper off the back foot
Bond to Haddin, no run full and driven hard to mid off
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run Vettori is a fraction short and Ponting waits for it and drives through mid off to the man on the fence
Vettori to Haddin, no run flatter into middle stump and played back to the bowler
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run Haddin comes down the pitch and drives to long off
Vettori to Ponting, no run Ponting lunges and plays to McCullum at cover
Vettori to Ponting, 3 runs angled down leg, Ponting sweeps and gets an under edge and it runs fine, Bond fields well on the rope to stop the boundary
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run short and punched to deep point
Bond to Haddin, 1 run driven to mid on for a quick single
Bond to Ponting, 1 run too straight and Ponting whips it off his hip to long leg
Bond to Haddin, 1 run short ball and Haddin tries to pull and it goes over point to the sweeper
Bond to Ponting, FOUR runs too short from Bond and Ponting is into position quickly and pulling over mid wicket for four
Bond to Ponting, no run slower ball and Ponting plays and misses outside off
Bond to Ponting, no run great delivery from Bond angles in and nips away from Ponting, beating the outside edge
Styris to Haddin, no run angled into leg stump and played to square leg
Styris to Haddin, no run steps way to leg and plays back to the bowler
Styris to Haddin, no run good length and Haddin pushes into the on side where Guptill saves one
Styris to Haddin, 2 wide well down the leg side and Hopkins can't hold onto it and they take a run too
Styris to Ponting, 1 run into leg stump and whipped to fine leg
Styris to Haddin, 1 run back of a length and played into the leg side for a quick single despite Guptill's good work
Styris to Ponting, no run straight again and played to Taylor at square leg where he dives to save a single
Bond to Haddin, 1 run short and wide and undercut in the air through backward point past the outstretched hand of Taylor to third man
Bond to Ponting, FOUR runs fullish delivery and Pongtin drives exquisitely past Vettori at mid off for four, super stroke!
Bond to Ponting, no run good length outside off and Ponting plays off an open face to point
Bond to Ponting, no run slower ball and Ponting plays to backward point
Bond to Ponting, FOUR runs half volley just outside off stump and Ponting punches through the covers bisecting McCullum initially and then Vettori for for
Bond to Ponting, 1 run full slower ball and Ponting drives off the outside half of the bat to third man
Styris to Ponting, FOUR runs angled down leg and Ponting clips it off his hip fine for four through fine leg
Styris to Ponting, 1 run too straight again and whipped through the leg side behind square
Styris to Haddin, 1 run full on middle and Haddin drop kicks over forward square leg to the sweeper
Styris to Ponting, no run good length driven back to the bowler
Styris to Ponting, 1 run back of a length and worked through mid wicket to the sweeper
Styris to Haddin, 1 run Haddin steps away to the leg side and drives to Vettori at cover and he misfields to allow a single
Mason to Haddin, FOUR runs good channel from Mason and Haddin guides it with the softest of hands, playing ever so late fine of third man for four
Mason to Haddin, no run slower ball outside off and Haddin tries to heave it through the leg side but misses and Hopkins is untidy behind the stumps
Mason to Haddin, no run defended into the leg side for no run
Mason to Haddin, no run back of a length and defended into the off side
Mason to Haddin, no run good length and Haddin plays it late into the ground and it hits Hopkins in the chin. Tough break for the wee man
Mason to Haddin, 2 runs angled into leg stump and Haddin works it fine for a couple to fine leg
Guptill to Ponting, no run tossed up outside off and defended into the off side
Guptill to Ponting, no run flatter on middle and Ponting plays into the leg side
Guptill to Ponting, 1 run shorter and punched off the back foot through point to the man on the fence

Guptill to Haddin, 1 run Dropped Haddin slog sweeps over mid wicket, Southee moves well out in the deep and grabs it initially but then puts it down as he hits the ground. Guptill is robbed. New Zealand just put down too many chances tonight
Guptill to Ponting, 1 run full and driven to long on
Guptill to Haddin, 2 runs flatter outside off and guided fine of third man for a couple
Mason to Ponting, 1 run in the channel and played late to third man
Mason to Haddin, 1 run back of a length again and played nicely off the face to third man
Mason to Hussey, 1 run into the pads and Hussey plays into the on side and takes a quick single, Haddin is sitting on his heels and would've been short of nhis ground if Guptill had've hit
Mason to Haddin, 1 run back of a length and played to third man by using the pace. That's Haddin's bread and butter
Mason to Hussey, no run good channel and Hussey defends to cover
Guptill to Haddin, 1 run Guptill drags it down but it turns sharply but Haddin plays nicely to deep point
Guptill to Hussey, no run full and driven to Taylor at cover
Guptill to Hussey, 1 wide drifts down the leg side and called wide
Guptill to Hussey, SIX runs a fraction too short and Hussey uses the depth of the crease and pulls over square leg for six!
Guptill to Hussey, no run tossed up and defended back to the bowler
Guptill to Hussey, no run well flighted and driven hard at Taylor at cover
Guptill to Hussey, 1 leg bye angled into the pads from around the wicket and Hussey whips it off his hip to short fine leg for a quick single
Mason to Hussey, no run full and driven uppishly to mid off
Mason to Hussey, no run full again and driven back at the bowler
Mason to Hussey, 1 run slower ball wide of off stump and Hussey guides to third man
Mason to Haddin, 1 run back of a length and Haddin is content on guiding to third man
Mason to Hussey, no run full on off stump and Hussey drives off the outside half of the blade to cover
Mason to Hussey, 1 run fullish length and Hussey pushes to mid off and runs
Southee to Hussey, no run good length and Hussey is back and defending to extra cover
Southee to Hussey, no run good length again and Hussey is tight in defence
Southee to Haddin, 1 run Haddin doesn't pick it up and plays an awkward cut shot to deep point
Southee to White, no run back of a length and White plays late to backward point
Southee to White, 1 run bumper from Southee and White pulls down nicely to Styris at long leg
Mason to White, no run back of a length and punched to mid off from the back foot
Mason to White, 1 run good length and White drives off the outside half through point
Mason to Haddin, no run good channel from Mason again and Haddin tries to guide to third man again but misses and Hopkins takes the bails off. They take a look upstairs but his foot is grounded
Mason to Haddin, 2 runs angled into middle stumpa dn Haddin heaves it over square leg where Ingram dives to save four in the deep and they come back for the second
Mason to Haddin, no run full and driven to cover
Mason to Haddin, no run slower ball is short and pulled to mid wicket
Southee to White, no run good length driven on the up to cover point
Southee to White, FOUR runs back of a length and White pushes through mid on for four off the back foot and that runs away for four, great timing!
Southee to White, no run good length again from Southee and White plays into the off side
Southee to White, no run great channel as Southee continues to bend his back and White punches to mid off
Southee to White, FOUR runs just a touch short and White pulls powerfully past fine leg for four
Southee to White, FOUR runs full from Southee and White cracks it through mid on for four more, super stroke!
Styris to Haddin, SIX runs full straight away from Styris and Haddin takes on the long on fieldsman and hits it over him for half a dozen, quality hitting
Styris to Haddin, 1 run full on middle and driven nicely to long on to bring up his ton, well played Brad Haddin for his second ODI hundred, both against NZ!
Styris to White, no run yorker on leg stump dug out to mid wicket
Styris to White, no run full and driven to mid off
Styris to White, 1 run back of a length and driven off the back foot to long on
Styris to Haddin, SIX runs full on middle stump and crunched over mid wicket for six more, he just wants to finish it in a hurry now and who blames him

Vettori to White, no run full and played back to the bowler

Vettori to Haddin, OUT 76 kph, well flighted and Haddin tries to hammer it out of the ground but misses and Hopkins has plenty of time to remove the bails. The end of a great innings from Haddin, not a bad replacement at the top of the order...

Styris to White, 1 run full on middle and worked through mid wicket to the sweeper
Styris to Voges, 1 run a fraction short and Voges cuts through cover point for a single
Southee to Voges, no run good channel again from Southee and Voges pushes to cover point
Southee to Voges, no run back of a length and Voges plays late to Broom at backward point
Southee to Voges, 1 run Voges advances this time and cuts backward of point to third man
Southee to White, no run Southee hits the deck again and White pushes to mid on off the back foot
Southee to White, no run good channel and White doesn't want to give it away and punches to mid off
Southee to White, no run back of a length and White defends into the off side
Styris to Voges, no run full on middle stump and worked to square leg
Styris to Voges, FOUR runs half volley on middle and Viges whips it into the gap at mid wicket for four to win the game, well done Australia who take an important 2-1 lead in the series
This is Marc Ellison on behalf of the crew here at Cricinfo saying thanks again and we will see you soon. Bye for now.
Thanks for joining us today. Join us again on Thursday at 1400 local time, that is 0100 GMT for the 4th ODI from Auckland.

Brad Haddin deservedly takes the Man of the Match award for his magnificent 110. Haddin is glad to push on to three figures after getting a few starts in the series, especially with his skipper putting the pressure on the top order for someone to make a ton.

Ricky Ponting is obviously chuffed with the team for their efforts and admits that bowling first was the right choice in the end and that, possibly, that could be the way to go in the future. He says his batsmen need to continue to make big scores and is happy they take the momentum to Auckland.

Daniel Vettori blames the top order for a poor showing as the reason why they weren't able to post a competitive total. He says the wicket was more like a 300 run track and not the 250 they scored. He says injuries are an issue and he is hopeful that they have 15 fit players for Thursday.

New Zealand simply did not score enough runs and the Batting Power Play worked to their detriment as they lost five for 32 to be bowled out for 246 when, with Styris and Hopkins at the crease, they looked like posting close to 300 which would've been a far more competitive total.
Haddin (110) and Ponting (69) added 151 for the second wicket and the match was over pretty early in that sense with both players looking in total control at the crease.

Australia win by the comfortable margin of six wickets with 16 balls to spare. Australia outplayed New Zealand in all departments today and will take a lot of momentum into the 4th ODI in Auckland on Thursday.
Australia won by 6 wickets (with 16 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Brad Haddin, AUS
